enWisdom: Sincerity is [a means of attaining] success
Sincerity is the highest [form of] success
Sincerity is the attribute of the most excellent people
Sincerity is the worship of the Near Ones [to Allah]
Sincerity is the most honourable end
Sincerity is the fruit of worship
Sincerity is the foundation of worship
Sincerity is the fruit of certitude
Sincerity is the goal [of worship]

Wisdom: الْإِخْلَاصُ خَطَرٌ عَظِيمٌ حَتَّى يُنْظَرُ بِمَا [بِمَا ذَا] يُخْتَمُ لَهُ
enWisdom: Sincerity is in grave danger, until it is seen what it concludes with

Wisdom: وَأَخْلِصْ لِلَّهِ عَمَلَكَ وَعِلْمَكَ وَحُبَّكَ وَبُغْضَكَ وَأَخْذَكَ وَتَرْكَكَ وَكَلَامَكَ وَصَمْتَكَ
enWisdom: Let your action, your knowledge, your love, your hatred, your taking, your leaving, your speech and your silence [all] be [sincerely] for the sake of Allah

Wisdom: الْزَمِ الْإِخْلَاصَ فِي السِّرِّ وَالْعَلَانِيَةِ وَالْخَشْيَةَ فِي الْغَيْبِ وَالشَّهَادَةِ وَالْقَصْدَ فِي الْفَقْرِ وَالْغِنَى وَالْعَدْلَ فِي الرِّضَا وَالسَّخَطِ
enWisdom: Adopt sincerity in secret and in the open, fear [of Allah] when unseen and seen, moderation in poverty and wealth, and equity in satisfaction and anger
If you are sincere, you will be successful

Wisdom: زُورُوا فِي اللَّهِ وَجَالِسُوا فِي اللَّهِ وَأَعْطُوا فِي اللَّهِ وَامْنَعُوا فِي اللَّهِ
enWisdom: Visit each other for the sake of Allah, sit [and mingle] with each other for the sake of Allah, give for the sake of Allah and withhold for the sake of Allah
The chiefs of the people of Paradise are the sincere ones

Wisdom: طُوبَى لِمَنْ أَخْلَصَ لِلَّهِ عِلْمَهُ وَعَمَلَهُ وَحُبَّهُ وَبُغْضَهُ وَأَخْذَهُ وَتَرْكَهُ وَكَلَامَهُ وَصَمْتَهُ
enWisdom: Blessed is he who makes his knowledge, his actions, his love, his hatred, his taking, his leaving, his speech and his silence sincere for [attaining the pleasure of] Allah

Wisdom: عَلَيْكُمْ بِصِدْقِ الْإِخْلَاصِ وَحُسْنِ الْيَقِينِ فَإِنَّهُمَا أَفْضَلُ عِبَادَةِ الْمُقَرَّبِينَ
enWisdom: You must espouse true sincerity and complete certitude, for these two are the best forms of worship of the Near Ones [to Allah]
The highest form of certitude is sincerity
The merit of an action is the sincerity in it
He who makes his worship sincere succeeds in attaining prosperity
The kings of Paradise are the God-wary and the sincere
